name: Jowatel
overview:
JOWATEL Telecommunications’ mission is to help businesses expand and keep pace with the latest technologies in Voice communications and Unified messaging by increasing their efficiency and saving them time and money. The Company’s objective is to offer the best possible solutions through versatile and powerful products and personalized after-sales support.”

This is the successful philosophy of Joe Bou-rjeili, President and founder of JOWATEL Telecommunications inc. which provides a one-stop solution with a complete line of telephone systems, Unified Communications (UC) voice mail systems, Voice over IP solutions, Call Centre Solutions, Computer telephony integration (CTI), local telephone and long distance services, and voice and data cabling services. For the Company, it is not only a matter of selling products, but also, of providing a turnkey solution and ongoing personalized service support.

“As consultants, we strive to fulfill our clients’ present and long-term needs in order to preserve their initial investment”.

JOWATEL represent over 30 years of history in telecommunications, partnering with leaders such as: Toshiba, Panasonic, Samsung, Mitel, Nortel, Philips, IWATSU Voice Networks, Esnatech Technologies and many others.
